title: Life's Greatest Adventure
subtitle: Balancing Success with What Matters Most
description: As a father, I've discovered that the greatest achievements aren't measured in valuations or exits, but in the moments shared with family. This role has taught me patience, perspective, and the true meaning of legacy.

highlights.title: Presence
highlights.description: Being there for the moments that matter

family_values.description: Doing the right thing, even when no one is watching
Treating everyone with respect and compassion
Getting back up every time you fall

philosophy: Success without fulfillment is the ultimate failure. True wealth is measured in the relationships we build and the positive impact we have on those we love.
life_lessons: Time is the most valuable currency - spend it wisely
Lead by example, not by words
Every challenge is an opportunity to grow
favorite_moments: Teaching my kids to ride a bike
Family camping trips under the stars
